document.full_text: hamas security forces in gaza stormed a building where killers of a pro-palestinian italian activist were hiding on tuesday and two of the al qaeda-inspired militants died in the raid, hamas said.
document.title: killers of italian activist die in gaza raid: hamas
lines_and_colors: hamas security forces in gaza stormed a building where killers of a pro-palestinian italian activist were hiding on tuesday and two of the al qaeda-inspired militants died in the raid, hamas said.
